CustomField.description: Red, Yellow or Green flag for QuickBooks Online Invoices, representing Overdue, Due, and Paid
CustomField.formula:
IF( CONTAINS($User.UIThemeDisplayed, 'Theme4'),
IF( ISBLANK( breadwinner_qbo__Internal_Status__c ), IF( OR(breadwinner_qbo__Status__c = 'Paid', breadwinner_qbo__Status__c = 'Closed'), IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/green-flag.png", "Paid"), IF( breadwinner_qbo__Type__c = 'Credit Memo', IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/yellow-flag.png", "Unapplied"), IF( breadwinner_qbo__Amount_Overdue__c > 0, IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/red-flag.png", "Overdue") , IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/yellow-flag.png", "Open/Partial" ) ) ) ), IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/voided_deleted_36.png", "Deleted / Voided") ),
IF( ISBLANK( breadwinner_qbo__Internal_Status__c ), IF( OR(breadwinner_qbo__Status__c = 'Paid', breadwinner_qbo__Status__c = 'Closed'), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Paid", 16, 16), IF( breadwinner_qbo__Type__c = 'Credit Memo', IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "Unapplied", 16, 16), IF( breadwinner_qbo__Amount_Overdue__c > 0, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Overdue", 16, 16) , IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "Open/Partial", 16, 16) ) ) ), IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/voided_deleted.png", "Deleted / Voided") ) )
CustomField.label: Status Flag
